headline: Assessing Global Payments (GPN) Valuation After Prolonged Share Price Weakness
summary: Without a single defining headline driving attention today, Global Payments (GPN) is in focus for investors who are reassessing payment technology names, using its recent share performance and fundamental profile as a starting point. See our latest analysis for Global Payments. At a share price of US$79.68, Global Payments has seen short term momentum firm up, with a 7 day share price return of 3.45%.
